anime.description: Hiromi and Haruko are on the track-and-field club at their middle school. They dream of going to the Olympics. While in the middle of preparing for the national sports meet for long-distance relay racing, Haruko starts getting bullied. This hurts Haruko, but Hiromi supports and encourages her. The day before the long-distance relay race meet, Haruko`s father teaches the two of them about what is important in life by telling them about a wartime experience of his. In their days in the track-and-field club, the two will learn the importance of courage, dreams, and friendship. Source: Official website
